name: Buckler
text: 1 @armour@. This can be used even if you have a @2H:two-handed@ weapon.

name: Chain mail
text: 3 @armour@

name: Helmet
text: 1 @armour@, -1 vigilance

name: Shield
text: 3 @armour@

name: Tower shield
text: +4, 4 @armour@

name: Animal bait
text: Can be consumed for +5 to make an animal do what you want. Comes in vegetarian, meat, and bug versions.

name: Caltrops
text: Can be laid for a trap inflicting @bleeding@ and -5 athletics ueob.

name: Citronella oil
text: Dogs and bugs hate this.

name: Fishing rod
text: By a body of water with fish, you may sacrifice a bit of bug or meat bait and check END+vig vs 12; on a pass, after 2 hours, you get a fish worth a day's supplies.

name: Lamp
text: Provides dim light within 5m.

name: Lockpick
text: +5 to pick locks.

name: Matches
text: Start a POW=1 fire.

name: Medical kit
text: +5 to first aid checks. Includes bandages, alcohol, scissors, tweezers.

name: Pitons
text: With a hammer, take +5 to climb checks.

name: Rope
text: 10m of hemp rope. Can be used for whatever you want, but indicative uses are

name: Soft shoes
text: +1 to stealth.

name: Arrow
text: Fired from a bow.

name: Crowbar
text: +4. Can be used to open locked doors quickly.

name: Grenade
text: When you make a successful attack with this, aeor everyone within a 2m radius of the target checks END+ath vs the manufacturer's POW+knowledge, and takes the condition on a fail.

name: Rock
text: +1. May be treated as @loaded@ if for some reason there aren't rocks or other similar improvised weapons about.
